text: The volleyball competition at the 1991 European Youth Olympic Days was held from 18 to 20 July. The events took place in Brussels, Belgium. Girls born 1976 or 1977 or later participated in the event. No boys event was held. The event was held in the traditional indoor team format. ==Medal summary== ===Men=== {| |- |Basketball | | | |} ==References== Category:1991 European Youth Olympic Days European Youth Olympic Days 1991 European Youth Olympic Days
title: Volleyball at the 1991 European Youth Olympic Days
